title: Pixel is not working. qusb__bulk
content:
Hi!
My phone has stopped working.
It does not respond to the power button, there is nothing on the screen.

Windows Device Manager defines it as qusb__bulk.
Linux defines it as Qualcomm USB modem.

Bootloader is locked and I have always used only official android.

It seems that the device has switched to EDL mode.
I think this is a software error and you solved it in the last update:
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/pixel/2019-07-01
"Fixes an issue for some devices getting stuck in EDL mode with a blank screen"

Please help solve this problem.
